languages.text: "{name}, рада поздравить тебя со вступлением в право наследования. Теперь на твоих плечах покоится великий долг, порученный нам самим {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g} — надзирать за этим сектором и бдительно карать всякую скверну, что осмелится поднять голову в твоих владениях".

traits.locale_text: "{name}, рада поздравить тебя со вступлением в право наследования. Теперь на твоих плечах покоится великий долг, порученный нам самим Императором — надзирать за этим сектором и бдительно карать всякую скверну, что осмелится поднять голову в твоих владениях".

languages.text: "{name}, it is my pleasure to congratulate you on claiming your inheritance. Now you carry upon your shoulders the great duty entrusted to us by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself — to oversee this sector and remain vigilant as we strike down any and all corruption that dares to raise its head in your domain."
languages.original_text: "{name}, рада поздравить тебя со вступлением в право наследования. Теперь на твоих плечах покоится великий долг, порученный нам самим {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g} — надзирать за этим сектором и бдительно карать всякую скверну, что осмелится поднять голову в твоих владениях".

traits.locale_text: "{name}, it is my pleasure to congratulate you on claiming your inheritance. Now you carry upon your shoulders a great duty entrusted to us by the Emperor Himself — to oversee this sector and remain vigilant as we strike down any and all corruption that dares to raise its head in your domain."

"{name}, it is my pleasure to congratulate you on claiming your inheritance. Now you carry upon your shoulders a great duty entrusted to us by the Emperor Himself — to oversee this sector and remain vigilant as we strike down any and all corruption that dares to raise its head in your domain."

"{name}, it is my pleasure to congratulate you on claiming your inheritance. Now you carry upon your shoulders the great duty entrusted to us by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself — to oversee this sector and remain vigilant as we strike down any and all corruption that dares to raise its head in your domain."

"{name}, it is my pleasure to congratulate you on claiming your inheritance. Now you carry upon your shoulders the great duty entrusted to us by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself — to oversee this sector and remain vigilant as we strike down any and all corruption that dares to raise its head in your domain."

"{name}, it is my pleasure to congratulate you on claiming your inheritance. Now you carry upon your shoulders the great duty entrusted to us by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself — to oversee this sector and remain vigilant as we strike down any and all corruption that dares to raise its head in your domain."

languages.text: 「{name}、この度の継承にお祝い申し上げる。これで{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}より授かりし重大な務めを双肩に背負うことになる―すなわち、己の領地で芽を出すいかなる不正もあらゆる堕落も打ち倒せるよう、この星域の監視と用心を怠らないことだ」
languages.original_text: "{name}, it is my pleasure to congratulate you on claiming your inheritance. Now you carry upon your shoulders the great duty entrusted to us by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself — to oversee this sector and remain vigilant as we strike down any and all corruption that dares to raise its head in your domain."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、この度の継承にお祝い申し上げる。これで{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}より授かりし重大な務めを双肩に背負うことになる―すなわち、己の領地で芽を出すいかなる不正もあらゆる堕落も打ち倒せるよう、この星域の監視と用心を怠らないことだ」

languages.text: “{name}，我很荣幸见证你继任行商浪人。现在，你当肩负起{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}嘱托的重任——监管这片星区，时刻保持警惕，不遗余力地消灭任何胆敢在你的领土上蠢蠢欲动的腐化势力。”
languages.original_text: "{name}, it is my pleasure to congratulate you on claiming your inheritance. Now you carry upon your shoulders the great duty entrusted to us by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself — to oversee this sector and remain vigilant as we strike down any and all corruption that dares to raise its head in your domain."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，我很荣幸见证你继任行商浪人。现在，你当肩负起{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}嘱托的重任——监管这片星区，时刻保持警惕，不遗余力地消灭任何胆敢在你的领土上蠢蠢欲动的腐化势力。”

languages.text: «{name}, es un placer felicitarle por obtener su herencia. Ahora recae sobre sus hombros el gran deber que nos encomienda el mismísimo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}: supervisar este sector y no bajar la guardia, exterminando toda corrupción que ose aparecer en sus dominios».
languages.original_text: "{name}, it is my pleasure to congratulate you on claiming your inheritance. Now you carry upon your shoulders the great duty entrusted to us by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself — to oversee this sector and remain vigilant as we strike down any and all corruption that dares to raise its head in your domain."

traits.locale_text: «{name}, es un placer felicitarle por obtener su herencia. Ahora recae sobre sus hombros el gran deber que nos encomienda el mismísimo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}: supervisar este sector y no bajar la guardia, exterminando toda corrupción que ose aparecer en sus dominios».

languages.text: « Permettez-moi de vous féliciter pour l'accession à votre héritage, {name}. Il vous incombe désormais de veiller sur ce secteur et d'exterminer toute trace de corruption qui pourrait venir souiller votre domaine, car tel est le devoir que nous a confié l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} Lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "{name}, it is my pleasure to congratulate you on claiming your inheritance. Now you carry upon your shoulders the great duty entrusted to us by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself — to oversee this sector and remain vigilant as we strike down any and all corruption that dares to raise its head in your domain."

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-moi de vous féliciter pour l'accession à votre héritage, {name}. Il vous incombe désormais de veiller sur ce secteur et d'exterminer toute trace de corruption qui pourrait venir souiller votre domaine, car tel est le devoir que nous a confié l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} Lui-même. »

languages.text: "{name}, es ist mir eine Freude, Euch zur Beanspruchung Eures Erbes zu gratulieren. Ihr tragt nun auf Euren Schultern die große Pflicht, die der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} selbst uns auferlegt hat – über diesen Sektor zu wachen und jedwede Verderbnis niederzuschlagen, die es wagt, sich in Eurem Reich zu erheben."
languages.original_text: "{name}, it is my pleasure to congratulate you on claiming your inheritance. Now you carry upon your shoulders the great duty entrusted to us by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself — to oversee this sector and remain vigilant as we strike down any and all corruption that dares to raise its head in your domain."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, es ist mir eine Freude, Euch zur Beanspruchung Eures Erbes zu gratulieren. Ihr tragt nun auf Euren Schultern die große Pflicht, die der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} selbst uns auferlegt hat – über diesen Sektor zu wachen und jedwede Verderbnis niederzuschlagen, die es wagt, sich in Eurem Reich zu erheben."

languages.text: "Hakkın olan mirası sahiplenişini kutlamak benim için bir zevktir {name}. Bize bizzat {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} Hazretleri tarafından emanet edilen yüce görevi, bu sektörü denetleme ve egemenlik alanınızda baş göstermeye cesaret eden her türlü yozluğu ortadan kaldırmak için tetikte olma sorumluluğunu bundan sonra sen de sırtlanacaksın."
languages.original_text: "{name}, it is my pleasure to congratulate you on claiming your inheritance. Now you carry upon your shoulders the great duty entrusted to us by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself — to oversee this sector and remain vigilant as we strike down any and all corruption that dares to raise its head in your domain."

traits.locale_text: "Hakkınız olan mirası sahiplendiğiniz için sizi kutlamak benim için bir zevktir {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}. Bundan sonra, bize bizzat {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} tarafından emanet edilen yüce görevi, bu sektörü denetleme ve egemenlik alanınızda baş göstermeye cesaret eden her türlü yozluğu ortadan kaldırmak için tetikte olma sorumluluğunu siz de sırtlanacaksınız."
